dsOverview.title: Wilson, Henderson-Sellers' 1-Degree Global Vegetation and Soils

summary.p: Soil and vegetation type data from Henderson-Sellers on a global 1 degree grid. Also called the "Wilson tape."

reference.title: A global archive of land cover and soils data for use in general circulation climate models
